name: json-stringify-date
description: Like JSON.stringify, but preserve timezones in date objects and parse dates into Date object

scripts.postversion: npm run changelog && git add . && git commit -m "Version $(./script/package-version.js)" && git tag $(./script/package-version.js) && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:build && npm run test:node && npm run test:browser

author: Filipe Constantinov Menezes <fcmenezes87@gmail.com>
